index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the processing of certain development permits; transferring from the Engineering Department to the Department of Construction and Land Use the responsibility for certain permits, fees, and plans review relating to shoring and excavation, drainage, and traffic and street impacts associated with development permits; and making amendments to Titles 21 (Subtitle II), 22 (Subtitle VIII), and 23 of the Seattle Municipal Code in connection therewith.
